titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Blood Transfusion - Description

body.p: A Blood Transfusion is a CLINICAL INTERVENTION .
A Blood Transfusion is a procedure which is undertaken to replace blood that might be lost for example, during surgery or due to a serious injury.
A Blood Transfusion is also performed when the PATIENT is unable to produce blood properly because of an illness.
For further information on Blood Transfusions , see the NHS website at: Blood transfusion .
